div.p:
Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xix die
octobris quo Supra

The saide day It was Sufficientlie deliuerit and fundin that
Williame of gareauche sal releyve Jonhne Steuinson'
of four' barrellis of Ry meile at the handis of the videw
of Robert of Cullane et cetera

The xxiij day of October' the yer forsaid' It was
deliuerit be the aldirman and diuers' merchandmen that Thome
philp sal pay the tane half of the sex eln' of blew clath
pertening to William goldsmith' and Johne fechat the tothir half
and the said William sal deliuer the barrel of yrne to the
said thomas and he sal pay the fraucht of the said barrel

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxvj die mensis
octobris quo Supra

The saide day the aldirman and balyeis assignit monunday that next
cumis to Jonhne sanclar' to ansuer perempturlie to the borghe
strekit one him be J gilbert menyes for the wranguis' haldin
fra him of tua barrellis of Salmond' et cetera

The xxvij day of octobre forsaid' Androw mureson'
grantit him avand' to patrik grig lvij s' and iiij d'
scottis money for j boit bocht fra Androw grige to be pait
to the said patrik within viij dais eftir the fest of Saint
martyne next hereftir follouing befor Richard Waus balye and
mastir Androw craufurd' notar public'

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
Antepennultimo die mensis Octobris quo Supra

The saide day patrik leslie grantit that he hed' nay tak
of the merchand' butht that he now Inhabitis pertening to george
bysset langar thane to Witsonday next to Cum and that he suld'
red' the said butht to the said' george at the next Witsonday
and pay him his maile and Reman nay langar with it bot gif
he ples' the said george or the said' terme

The saide day the aldirman ordanit the lynaris to Comper one
that next cumis to giffurtht thar deliuerance of the lyning
betuix Androw mureson' and Donald' sclatar and thareftir the aldirman and
balyeis suld' minster Justice to the said partiis

Burgenses et fratres gilde tempore prepositure domini Johannis ruthirfurd Anno Domini
millesimo quadringentesimo nonagesimo Octauo

Andreas Scrogis Jure paterno recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito
Solito Juramento et Soluit v s' in alba bursa
Thomas forsitht recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito Solito Juramento
Johannes andirson' alias lochill' recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde ad
Willelmus lard recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde
Jonhnsone recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde
Johannes Wilkesone in Crovmar' recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde

Thomas Jonhnesone recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde propter laborem circa
Capcionem Interfector' Agnetis burges in nocte

Johannes Crukschank in fyve recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde
prestito Solito Juramento

Dauid chamer in Cullan recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito solito
Juramento
Andreas' Willelmus Dvne recipitur in liberum burgensem quia sponsavit filiam burgensis prestito solito Juramento
Johannes King recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito Solito Juramento
Matheus rede recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratem gilde prestito solito Juramento
Andreas gordone recipitur in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito Solito Juramento

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem ix die
mensis nouembris anno quo Supra

The saide day comperit Jonhne andirsone burges of this
burghe and producit ane Indentur' maid' betuix him and peter
merand' in mydilburghe makand' mencion that the said peter
hed' sellit to the saide Jonhne sex thousand' yrne
to be deliuerit one the key of Abirdene at alhallouday bigan
for the quhilkis the said Jonhne suld' deluer deliuer to the said peter
Sextene stane of woll for ilkan thousand' And the said Jonhne offerit him
redy to deliuer the saide wol quhilkis he schew redy in his
lest befor Thomas leslie balye sere Jonhne stirueling notar
Walter philp Jonhne litstar forsy Dauisone patrik adamson' and at
the key schew him to deli resaue the said yrne and coud'
nocht fynd' the saide peter nor nayne procurator nor' factour'
for him to fulfill the said appontment tharfor he protestit solemptlie
that he tak nay skath tharthrow in tyme to Cum and for his costis
Skathis dampnis and expensis maid' and Sustenit be him tharthrow
And' for the fiwe li' g' contenit in the said' contrak to be pait be the
party brekand'

xiij die mensis nouembris anno quo Supra Alexander cheishame
in brichmond' infra vicecomitatum de narne fecit constituit et
ordanit ordinauit Johannem Colisone georgeum forbes de auchintoule
et alexandrum skene de eodem coniunctim et diuisim suos legittimos procuratores
ad prosequendum vnam equam nigram ab eo iniuste
habitam et detentam Agend' defendend' lites contestand' eandem
seu valorem recipiend' inde quieteclamand' promitten' de Rato
et grato cum Ceteris omnibus et singulis clausulis necessariis
seu oportunis

div.head: Nomina ad Inquisicionem patricij Dauisone
div.p:
Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xixo
die mensis nouembris anno quo Supra

div.head: Nomina ad Inquisicionem patricij Dauisone
div.p:
Alexander Rede Thomas prat Johannes Colison' gilbertus menyes
thomas Waus Andreas Cullan Junior Dauid gichtan Willelmus portar
Jacobus Kennartj malcomus crag patricius Rede Alexander nachtj
et Willelmus Wyntone Jurati dicunt quod quondam henricus Dauison'
alias henricus Walcar' patricius patricij Dauison' latoris presencium
obiit vltimo vestitus et sasitus ut de feodo ad pacem et fidem
domini nostri Regis de quadam terra anteriori Jacente infra dictum burgum in
vico Inferiori ecclesie ex boreali parte eiusdem vici inter terram Johannis malison'
ex orientali ex vna et terram altaris Sancti petrj infra ecclesiam
parochialem beati nicholaij de Abirdene situati partibus ab altera et communionem viam
regiam versus austrum Et quod dictus patricius est legittimus et propinquior
heres dicti quondam henrici patricij suj de dicta terra cum pertinenciis Et
quod est legittime etatis Et quod dicta terrav valet nunc per annum decim s'
et valuit tantum tempore pacis Et quod tenetur in capite de Supprimo
domino nostro Rege per seruicium burgagium Et nunc existit in manibus
domini nostri Regis per mortem dicti henrici per spacium duorum annorum aut eocirca in defectu
viri heredis Jus suum hucusque minime prosequentis datis et clausis
sub Sigillo Thome leslie vnius balliuorum dicti burgi ac
Sigill' quorundam quj huic Inquisicionem Intererant faciend'
Anno die mense et loco prenotatis

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxij die
mensis nouembris quo Supra

The saide day the aldirman and consal present for the tyme
grantit to sere Richerde Waus aucht merkis to sere
Androw Coupar fiwe markis and to sere Jonhne strathachin
four' merkis for this yer' to Cum for thar' continuale gude seruice
and residence to be maid' in the queir' and kirk of Abirdene
tharof thai assignit viij merkis to the said sere Robert of the vuirmyll

the saide fiwe merkis to the saide sere Androw of the said myll
And' the saide four' markis to the said sere Jonhne of the
maile of bogferloche to be rasit at thar avne
handis

The saide day the balyeis chargit Robert gothray to Reman within
the tolbutht quhile he pait xx s' tile alexander Red' for his composicioun
of fredome of the said' burghe

The saide day mathow Wricht oblist him be his
hand' vphaldin to mak gude seruice in the luge
and vteuthe to the bigin and furnysing of the queir'
at the commavnd and sicht of the aldirman consal and the
mastir of the kirkwerk and he sal nocht pas' to
nathir vthir werk without speciale licence of the aldirman
and the consal p for the quhilkis seruice to be done thai
sal nocht content and pay to the said mathow tuenty tua
merkis vsual money of Scotland the entre of the said
mathow was tharwith that at mertymes last bigane
the saide day Nichol masone and Dauid Wricht oblist
tham be the fathtis of thar bodiis the gret aithe suorne
to remane at Sanct nicholes werk in the luge and vteuthe
thar to mak daly gude seruice and to be leile and trew in al
pontis and nocht to pas' fra the saide werk without leif of the
aldirman consal and mastir of the werk for the quhilkis gude
seruice to be done thar sal content and pay to the saide nichol
tuenty ane merkis and to the saide Dauid auchtene merkis

The saide day the borghe' strekit apone Jonhne ramsay
be Williame gareauche for the haldin fra him of fiwe
barrelis meyle and four' barrelis of ber' was fundin of nane avale
be ane Suorne assis' gilbert menyes forspekar

The saide day the bailyheis chargit assignit thome tailyour
In futy to cum one monday to ansuer at the instance
of Alexander prat for the wrangwis' halding fra hyme
of ane franche crowne' quhilkis he laide in wed to the said
thome of viij s' ande iiij d' as day of Peremptour

The saide day Androw
lanyntone lamyntone was quyt of tua
pundis gret clamyt be William blinseile be his aitht gevin
till hyme to the saide William
